pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Exponentiated Composite Distributions // Contains the framework of the estimation, sampling, and hypotheses testing for two special distributions (Exponentiated Exponential-Pareto and Exponentiated Inverse Gamma-Pareto) within the family of Generalized Exponentiated Composite distributions. The detailed explanation and the applications of these two distributions were introduced in Bowen Liu, Malwane M.A. Ananda (2022) doi:10.1080/03610926.2022.2050399, Bowen Liu, Malwane M.A. Ananda (2022) doi:10.3390/math10111895, and Bowen Liu, Malwane M.A. Ananda (2022) doi:10.3390/app13010645.
